---
name: Add a Conference
about: Request a new conference to be added to the calendar
title: '[ADD] Conference Name Year'
labels: 'conference-addition'
assignees: ''
---

**Thank you for helping improve our conference calendar!** Fill in the fields below - only **title**, **year**, **id**, **type**, and **timezone** are required.

```yaml
title:
year:
id:
type: conference | summit | workshop
timezone:

full_name:
link:
sub: ML | CV | NLP | DM | SP | HCI | RO | SEC | PRIV | CONF | SHOP | CG | KR | AP

deadline: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM
abstract_deadline: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM

place:
date:
start: YYYY-MM-DD
end: YYYY-MM-DD

paperslink:
hindex:
note:
```

**Notes:**
- `id`: lowercase title + year (e.g., "neurips25")
- `timezone`: [Find yours here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones) (e.g., "America/Los_Angeles")
